document_data.name: Reldyk Applecrown
document_data.mainbody: '''Reldyk Applecrown''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. The [[Chosen of Mystra]], [[Elminster Aumar]], later borrowed his body.
document_data.Appearance: He was young and pleasant-looking, though not overly handsome.
document_data.Personality: He didn't have much of a personality left after the fight against [[Xarlandralath]].
document_data.Abilities: Reldyk Applecrown was one of the lesser War Wizards.
document_data.Relationships: His comatose body was later yielded up to [[Elminster Aumar]].
document_data.History: Reldyk Applecrown had taken some damage during the fight against [[Xarlandralath]], but the worst of his injuries was mental after he'd been caught in some magical backlash, which had left him comatose and experiencing occassional seizures. It was in this state that [[Vangerdahast]] offered his body to Elminster, the [[Chosen of Mystra]], who was in turn without a body after a beholder attack. With some magic, Elminster took possession of Reldyk Applecrown's body.
document_data.Hosting Elminster:
Elminster used Reldyk Applecrown's body to accompany Lady [[Darlethra Greatgaunt]], actually a disguised [[Storm Silverhand]], the Marchioness [[Immerdusk]], in her walks to and fro all over the city.{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|275|29}} He later used the same body still to pursue after [[Morligul Downdagger]] after he kidnapped one of the [[Lords of Waterdeep]], his friend [[Mirt]], believing him to be actually [[Rauligus Helderstone]], whom he was impersonating at the time.{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|278|29}}

He continued to wear that body for a bit,{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|293|31}} until while trying to lure the [[blueflame ghost]]s to [[the Bold Blazon]], he got caught in the crossfire after the War Wizards turned up. He bodily blocked one of [[Glathra Barcantle]]'s spells on [[Storm Silverhand]], getting Reldyk Applecrown's body completely annihilated in the process.{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|323-324|34}}
